body:
Along the same lines, you can increase the -ss setting to 32 or 64 to get better specular sampling with trans and BSDF types.

Cheers,
-Greg

Sent from my iPad

On Jul 24, 2013, at 9:31 AM, Andrew McNeil <amcneil at lbl.gov> wrote:
